title: Quiz 5: Kenya Context & Reporting
topicName: Community Health Diagnosis and Partnership Notes (CHNA)
description: Apply your knowledge to the Kenyan context, including health information systems, reporting, and challenges.

questions.question: In Kenya, which digital platform was developed to improve data collection and utilization at the community level?
questions.explanation: eCHIS is the specific digital platform used by CHWs in Kenya for data management.
questions.hint: The acronym stands for Electronic Community Health Information System.

questions.question: Which of the following are identified challenges in sharing Community Health Information (CHI) in Kenya? (Select all that apply)

options.text: Lack of standardization in data tools

questions.explanation: Infrastructure, standardization, and privacy are major challenges. There is typically a shortage, not an excess, of skilled workers.

questions.question: Match the Kenyan health entity to its role:

pairs.right: Support via funding and capacity building

questions.explanation: MoH leads policy; CHWs are frontline; NGOs support; M-Health uses mobile tech.
questions.hint: MoH is the top government body.

questions.question: A Community Health ___BLANK___ is a comprehensive document that assesses health status, identifies needs, and proposes strategies, serving as a tool for policymakers.
questions.explanation: A Community Health Report is the formal document produced at the end of the assessment.

questions.question: Arrange the sections of a Community Health Report in a logical standard order:
questions.explanation: Reports start with a summary, describe who was studied, how (methodology), what was found, and finally what to do (recommendations).

questions.question: Review the table below regarding Facility Assessments. Which facility type is primarily associated with 'Traditional Healers'?

richContent.content:
Facility TypeKey Focus
HospitalsSpecialization, Emergency Services
Public Health CentersAccessibility, Basic Services
???Cultural practices, Community influence

questions.explanation: Traditional Healers are assessed based on their cultural practices and location within the community.
questions.hint: Look for the option related to culture.

questions.question: The Kenya Health Information System (KHIS) is a platform used to inhibit data sharing between facilities to protect privacy.
questions.explanation: False. KHIS is developed to DEVELOP data sharing and integration, not inhibit it, though privacy is a concern that must be managed.
questions.hint: Is the goal to stop sharing or enable it?

questions.question: What section of a community health report provides a concise overview of the key findings and recommendations for quick reading by busy policymakers?
questions.explanation: The Executive Summary summarizes the entire report for quick consumption.
questions.hint: It is usually the first section.
